they all thought that she would want me there longer so i can inform them of the things i'm leaving behind so they wont get lost when i'm gone. but nope! i don't know if meda was thinking clearly! i was so sad! we finally said our good-bye's! i hugged everyone except for meda. we didn't really talk much that day and i could tell that there was tension between us. i didn't want that to happen cuz the day before, she was nice to me and asked me if i made my decision. i guess since she had those talks w/ my other coworkers and since she knows how everyone feels, she was kinda taking it out on me and just wanted me to leave! oh well. i had an appt. with human resources at 1:30pm. i wanted to let them know about how meda was treating me and possibly others. i told them everything! and what happened? nothing! she said that if i were to say something before i resigned, then they couldve done something!!! blablabla! actually the HR person understood what i was talking about. she said that from personal experience, she could definetely picture meda being the way i'm describing her. i guess she's had a hard time with her before too. oh well. she "indirectly" told me to write a letter to the director of the department just to inform how and what i've been feeling with meda after that, i finally left. i felt very sad to leave my coworkers. but happy to leave meda. i ended up calling my coworkers on my way home to ask them if meda said anything bout my empty z drive. she said they were looking at it and just locked herself and the other boss in the office. so, a few days passes by and i get a call. it was my coworker pshyra. she had some questions regarding my process in the work i did. she even said, that if meda let me stay longer, all the questions could've been answered and they wouldn't have to call me again. so, yeah, they had a meeting and they didn't even know some of the things i did. meda said that she would call me but pshyra suggested that she shouldn't and that's how i got to talk to pshyra again. hehe. i told them that it was fine for them to call if they have additional questions! so, yeah, lately i've been stressed. i told andy that i just wanted to get away for a bit! so, this weekend we're going camping. today, we put up the tent just to test it out! hehe. i'm sure i'll need this little vacation. i've been so depressed that i didn't go to some of my family parties last week. now i have a head ache. earlier today, we found out that andy's friend from arizona is in town so we all went out to dinner with her. after dinner, i got a head ache. i don't know if it's the food or boba i had! oh ya, we discovered a boba place in my area! hehe. we tried it out and it was so good!

my cousin from chicago has been in town for the last 9 days! yup, he just left today! i was finally able to hang out with him this past weekend. he actually came over my house a few times during the week but andy and i were both at work. basically, he would just come over to sleep. he went to vegas and on his way back from vegas, my brother dropped him off at my place. after that, his friend picked him up and they went to palm springs for a few days. so, he dropped him back off at our place again. that was friday so both me and andy were finally off of work and able to hang out with this guy! hehe. so, we just had dinner at wood ranch and decided to watch bruce almighty. i liked that movie...it even made me cry! when we got home, we just hung out, talked for a while, and andy and steve were just playing w/ the ps2. the following day was andy's sister's graduation. andy kinda wanted to go to the ceremony but at the last minute, his dad calls and asks if we can barbecue some of the meat for her party! so, we ended up not going! not that i wanted to miss her graduation or anything, but i would've been so hot! hehe...i just remember when i graduated and i felt so sorry for the people that came to the ceremony. everyone got burned! hehe. so, yeah, christine graduated yesterday from the same school i grauduated from...csuf! so, we went to the party! i kinda felt bad for steve cuz i figured that he would be bored. i told him that we're not as close to andy's cousins (from his mom's side), so a lot of times, we end up getting bored. but anyway, this party was okay! some of his cousins from his dad's side were actually there. i haven't seen them for so long! but anyway, it was fun to hang out with them again! oh yeah, ritche was there too and i finally got to hang out with him too. it was weird cuz andy had to do so many errands that i didn't really hang out with him. that's why i'm so glad that some of his cousins that i talk to were there! hehe. my dad and aunt also went...they were the first ones there and andy and i were kinda late! hehe. after the party, we went over to my bro's house so we all can go out to dinner or something. well, we ended up hanging out at the yard house in long beach. it was pretty cool. i ended up telling them some stories about myself that i never told anyone...besides andy! it was funny cuz i was kinda nervous telling my brother. hehe...he was just laughing. so, we had a few beers. the alcohol was kinda getting to me but i just felt really good. we didn't eat anything over there so we decided to just cruise hollywood and look for a place to eat. we ended up eating at pinks. it was andy's first time over there. i was so happy that andy came along cuz he's never stayed up that late with us before. we ended up getting home around 5am. anyway, i had a lot of fun! a lot of times when my cousin is here, we go out for long drives late at night! getting home at 5am is a usual thing for us. after that, i was so tired that i knocked out on our way back. we finally got to my bro's house and andy and i decide to leave right after. yup, i had to drive home. then today, sunday, we just met my bro, sis, and steve, at todai to have lunch together...then he was off to the airport! that's it!
i got kinda hooked on mtv's surf girls and tonight was the last episode! the girl that i wanted to win, kula, ended up not winning! she did pretty good though...2nd place! oh well.

so, i just got back from my camping trip! it was an alright trip! it was only "alright" cuz some of andy's friends are just soooo obnoxious! on top of that, andy was getting on my nerves too! maybe i was just pms'ing! anyway, there's no need to post the details of this trip...considering i didn't have a good time! hehe. oh well. on another note, while i was camping, jason text me! yup, jason and maureen have their new baby girl...melia joie. she was born on saturday july 27, 2003! congrats!

i was supposed to go clubbing with my friends tonight but it didn't work out!! =( i ended up not going cuz i had to pack up for my camping trip! i'm leaving early tomorrow morning! okay...more work to do!.........

friday night, andy and i decided to go grunion running! (i know how to spell it now...hehe). so, we went...and lynce wanted to go so we picked her up! joey and kristina also went but we just met them over there. haha...i also ran into my dad at the beach! cool! what sucked was...there were no fish comin' out! oh well. it was still cool...cuz i got to hang out with lynce and the other peeps! hehe. the following night, we all went to dinner for andy's 2 friends' birthdays! we went to a really nice restaurant right by laguna beach! it was nice to see everyone...no one was missing--FINALLY! hehe. anyway, we had a nice dinner and then the two celebrants opened up their gifts in the restaurant. after that, miles got up and said there was one more gift for patty. he asked her to get up...and then it happened!!! he got down on his knee and proposed...with a nice ring! it was beautiful! i kinda had a feeling but never really knew for sure! so yeah....another friend of ours just got engaged! how exciting! i kinda feel special or fortunate that i've witnessed two proposals this year! wow. on the other hand, i keep getting the comment, "don't worry, you'll be next!" umm...sometimes i can get really tired of it. this time, i got really sad. i was (trying) to hide it from andy! so, yeah, i'm really happy for them but at the same time, sad for me...or dissapointed...or is it scared? i just don't wanna settle for "this" the rest of my life! i still have my dream...and i'm anxiously waiting to move on with my life! how long does a girl have to wait?! we've already been together for almost 12 freakin' years! a girl can only wait so long! besides...if we don't have the same goals in life, then what's the point of staying together?! i don't wanna waste my time! hehe...okay okay...i'm being a little too harsh! i know i wanna spend my life with andy! i guess a part of it is that the people get to me! people always asking when we're gonna get married, when we're gonna have a baby, etc. at the end, i get this feeling and i ask myself..."does andy NOT want to spend the rest of his life with me?" he says he does but i know other people may think otherwise. i guess that's why i get scared and/or sad. oh well....we'll see what happens in the future! don't get me wrong...i am still happy with this guy...i guess i just want my life to move forward! i know that wont happen though until i find a full time job! my day will (eventually) come!

yes...i'm still awake?! actually, i just got home. yesterday was gavin's baptism. it's kinda funny...he got baptised in the same church i was baptised in. hehe. anyway, it was nice. the priest was pretty strict. he made some points though...some i never really thought of...or didn't think of it as being so extreme. he was strict but somehow he kinda inspired me? anyway, we had dinner afterwards at naga's restaurant in long beach. another funny thing is that i went clubbing with grace at this place.....and this is the same place gavin is having his baptism celebration! hehe. anyway, that restaurant was really nice. we had such a pretty view! i want someone to have a wedding reception there! hehe. so, yeah, i had a good time...hanging out with my girls! :) for gavin's gift, i ended up getting him a white gold bracelet with his name! i thought it was pretty cute! my mom wanted me to get the yellow gold just to be traditional but i liked the look of the white gold better! hehe. after the reception, andy and i were going to try to make it to my neice's (kayla's) dance performance. however, we kinda got into a bind! joey's garage got broken into and he needed andy's help to figure out what to do. so, instead of going to kayla's thing, andy just dropped me off at my mom's house. everyone was at the performace and no one was home. i didn't have the key so i had to break into the house. hehe....i climbed through the window. so, andy left to go to his friend's house and i was left alone. i ended up calling vanessa in the meantime! eventually, my bro came over to pick me up and we all went to a late dinner at norms. so, i'm still happy cuz even if i missed the performace, i saw all the people that counted! hehe. awww...poor kayla though! she did 4 different performances and on the ballet performance, she was supposed to run through the stage and make a flying leap! well, she slipped and fell. but she was able to get herself back up and get right with the beat again! haha. that was so cool! anyway, andy was kinda sad he didn't get to see her! after all, andy is kayla's ninang! oh well. she's going to have many more performances in the future! :) okay, i guess i'm feeling it! i need to get some sleep. good night/morning!
there's only so much time you can spend on the phone talking about the same old thing! stop it! stop ruining my day! hehe.
friendster sucks right now! i can never get it! coach can catch a ball now....but still doesn't like to share! my fish is eating feeder goldfish now! yuck! hehe.

happy belated 4th of july! andy and i didn't do much. we usually do a picnic at shoreline park but we didn't go this year. we were just indecisive! we couldn't decide whether we should go to shoreline, to andy's friend's house, or my cousin's house! haha...so, we ended up staying home! it was cool though cuz we were able to get a lot of things done! at around 9pm, andy and i decided that we wanted to go grunyun (sp?) running! well, in order to do that, you're "supposed" to have a fishing license. we were driving all over town to find a place that was open but we were unsuccessful. on the other hand, it felt like we were on an episode on girls gone wild! we basically got stuck in traffic at newport beach for about 3 hours. it was funny though...very entertaining! so, after all that traffic, we finally made it to the beach...cabrillo beach. it was kinda crowded there and there and a lot of people were flashing their flashlights in the water. so, we didn't get to get any fish. i don't know if they were just scared.......or what. oh well. we brought coach with us and i still had fun. saturday, we just visited andy's friends at their new house in long beach. that's it...kicked back. sunday, we went to carson for frolyn's baby shower. it was kinda fun and yippee...andy won 2 games! hehe. after that, we visited vanessa for a bit and then finally visited my parents. umm...they kinda gave me a hard time today! my mom kept saying that she misses me and that she's lonely...blablabla. well, i hardly ever go there nowadays... so, we finally got home! =) i was kinda falling asleep and then andy came home from his parent's house! i guess his relatives that were here from hawaii gave some snacks! yummy! i finally have picked mango! i haven't had that for ages! yum... so, andy got an invitation for his cousin jackie's wedding in hawaii. i would've liked to go but we can't really afford it! i just wish we knew about it earlier so we could've saved up our money for that trip! oh well. anyway, i'm tired!

lately, andy has been helping joey with his new house that i barely got to see my boyfriend! hehe. it's cool though! so, last saturday, he went over to joey's again and i was bored. i wanted to see his new house but i didn't wana stay there the whole day. so, i was supposed to go separately. anyway, first i went to cerritos mall just to look around. after that, i decided to visit my brother since i haven't seen him in a long time! i ended up hanging out there too long that i didn't even go to joey's. oh well. andy ended up coming over and we just had dinner together. after dinner, we got some boba! hehe. so, sunday came. we ended up going to LA just because......and we found one of those game thingies...where you can play 70,000 different games. it's pretty cool...very old school. after LA, we went over to d's cousin's house in diamond bar. there was a get together since a few of andy's relatives from hawaii are in town. they make me wanna go back so bad! oh well...no money! now i'm working on a few scrapbook pages for my ex-boss. the director of the health ed. dept. is leaving and they asked if i wanted to participate in this project. since i never had anything against her, i decided to participate.

so, friday i went to disneyland with my cousins, nieces, and nephew. andy and i got there around 4:30pm. surprisingly, it wasn't as crowded as i thought it would be. the kids had fun...as alwayz. after that, we had dinner at thai barbecue in carson. andy and i weren't planning on going to carson but we did anyway. the kids were so tired and of course they knocked out--before dinner! hehe. after dinner, i just went over to my cousin's house to hang out. after a while, the adult cousins decided to go to hermosa beach to hit up a bar. we went to the same area as sharkees or whatever that's called. but instead of going there, we went to the lighthouse. we just had a few drinks, talked, and then left. supposedly, that was our last night with them...but we were just asking what their plans were for saturday. i know that they were going to the in-laws' home and then go back to chicago from there. they didn't have to be there till like 6pm so they asked us if we can take them to a water park. of course we didn't refuse...so saturday afternoon, we headed over to wild rivers in irvine. it was okay. we were supposed to leave at 11am but we were 30 minutes late. we were so tired from the night before. well, we figured that since they had to leave the park by 3:30pm, once we get to the house, we would take off and leave. but instead, they wanted to eat out. i kinda felt bummed cuz i knew they had to leave the park early...so we wouldn't have that much time over there. we probably didn't get there till close to 2pm. oh well. it was still a fun day. it was scary cuz we fit 7 people in my car. not only that, but some of the kids were supposed to have car seats but the "adults...or my elders" said that it would be okay! so, andy and jt sat in the front. lily (3 years old) was the only one with a car seat. jane and i also sat in the back. additionally, justin (7 years old) and kayla (6 years old) sat on our laps. isn't that scary. just so anyone knows...i would never do that to any of my kids. oh well. after the chicago people left, justin and kayla wanted to spend the weekend with me and andy. when i see andy with the kids, i can tell that he's going to be such a good dad! the kids get along with him so well! they like him more than they like me. hehe. before we got to our house, we had to go to joey's house. andy and i are part of ross's wedding so the whole bridal entourage will be throwing them a wedding shower. so, the planning committee met at joey's house. it was cool cuz we got a few things accomplished. hehe. so, we finally got to my house, watched tv, and then slept. today, we spent a good portion of the day at the pool. i didn't realized how dark justin and kayla are! they are already pretty good at swimming and i don't even know how to float! hehe...they wanna teach me! we had breakfast, went to the pool (for like 3 hours), ate lunch, watched tv, watched freaky friday, went to the pool, took a bubble bath, eat dinner, watch tv, and now they're finally sleeping! andy is too...he's going to work tomorrow. i will be dropping the kids off to carson sometime tomorrow. oh ya, i also have to go to andy's parent's house to let their dog go pee-pee. hehe.

today, i went out to dinner with my cousins and other relatives! it was fun. i made reservations today and they normally don't take reservations unless it's at least a day in advanced! well, they decided to squeeze us in. when we got there, they had a little room set just for us! it was nice. thank god they did that cuz there were many kids that were loud and just runnin around! i felt bad for the waitress though cuz it seemed like she was having a hard time. oh well. disneyland...here i come! hehe.

i just had an interview yesterday. i'm not sure if it went well though. first of all, i was about 40 minutes late. it wasn't completely my fault since i received the wrong directions from one of the people who interviewed me. she felt bad and kept apologizing. geez...you don't know how stressed i was looking for the place and knowing that i was going to be late. i've never been late to an interview before. in fact, i'm always there super early! anyway, i finally found the place and i was still stressed out. that's the bad part. i think me being stressed kind of showed during the interview. so, first, i met with one lady. she decided to get the interview started and asked me a few questions regarding the work i did at molina. in actuality, we were kind of waiting for the director of the dept. to get in but for some reason, she was taking a long time. basically, i was in with the first lady (about 15-20 minutes). that's when i felt like i didn't do too well simply because i was stressed out. so, finally, the director joined us and somehow i snapped out of my "stressness." i just became more calm and was able to answer all their questions without any problems. after the interview, i thanked them for having me...blablabla-----esp. even after i was late. i didn't mean to make that other lady feel bad but after i said that, she apologized again! hehe. actually, the director told the vice president that i was running late since someone gave me the wrong directions. hehe. the vice president said that it was okay...that it'll add additional stress on top of the interview process and we'll just see how she does! apparently, the director thought i did pretty well even with the amount of stress i was going through! she didn't see the first half of it though! at least, i'm not the one who totally looks bad since everyone knows the directions i received were wrong! hehe. oh well. i kinda doubt i'll get this job. we'll see. the other day, i accidentally left my car door kind of open...which made the inside light stay on the whole night. ever since then, the car would have a hard time starting. i'm poor so i'm trying to just drive around...recharging the battery! i don't know if that's working cuz after driving around, i went grocery shopping and the car had a hard time starting again. hopefully, it'll start again today. i'm supposed to be driving my cousin jane (from chicago) around and to pick up her husband from the airport. i will probably have to go to costco with my dad to get a new battery. oh well. another thing planned for the night is dinner...at a hawaiian place. most likely the loft AGAIN! hehe. friday, we are all going to disneyland! i wont be there until towards the night. after disney, the kids will be spending the night at our place! so fun! hehe.

i borrowed a book from vanessa called, "memoirs of a geisha." i decided to give it a try. she gave it to me when she went to my brother's house on monday. i started reading it that night...and discovered that it was really interesting! and tonight...i finished the book! how exciting! it took me a week to read it! i'm so proud of myself considering that i never like to read books. so, yeah, this is my first book that i've read on my own...for my own pleasure and not for school. hehe. it's a different feeling when you're not reading for an english class or whatever...and you don't have to concentrate on little details. so, this is such an accomplishment!!! now i wanna get another book that is similar to "memoirs of a geisha." any suggestions? anyway, friday, andy and i did a lot of errands together. well, we just bought stuff we needed...and stuff for my dog, coach. that night, andy and i spent some time in the pool. the following day, saturday, we had to go to carson for my cousin's 40th birthday party. it was a luau so we were supposed to dress in our hawaiian gear. i didn't have anything except for shorts and i didn't feel like wearing shorts. instead, i just wore a white top with jeans, and my puka (sp?) shell necklace. andy had a hawaiian print shirt that we got when we went to hawaii a while back. so, anyway, my cousin and her daughter are in town from chicago. i was excited to see them. my other cousin finally got to the party and asked why me and the chicago cousin weren't in our hawaiian gear. she asked if she wanted her to drive back home (about 5 min away) to pick up some materials she had to make a lau lau. haha...i don't know how to spell that either. well, i didn't even know what a lau lau was but i found out it was just a piece of material you wrap around your waist...like a skirt i guess. well, my cousin was there the whole time so i didn't think we had to use the lau lau. it turned out that the husband and my bro went to pick up the material! haha. we couldn't say "no" so that's what we wore. i felt uncomfortable cuz the material i had was so long that when we double knotted it, there was a huge bulge that was unattractive! hehe. so instead, i just tied it once! i was uncomfortable for a while cuz i didn't want it to untie and have me exposed at a party! haha...that wouldn't be good. after a while, i asked andy if he knew how to tie a lau lau and surprisingly, he said he knew how. so, we went to the bathroom and he fixed it for me. he was able to wrap the material around me twice instead of once! that was good so i would have a smaller knot...that would be double knotted. haha...so complicated. anyway, andy was kinda dissappointed cuz he thought that since it was a luau, hawaiian food would be served. haha..but it was the same food that they usually serve at a party. oh well. what was different about this party was that they hired a belly dancer for the birthday celebrant. it was quite entertaining! it was very cool..... also, my cute neices and nephew performed a few hula dances. it was a fun party! we were the last ones to leave. oh yeah...that day was also frolyn's kid's birthday but we didn't get to go obviously cuz of my cousin's thing. oh well. tomorrow i'm supposed to go to california adventure.....and have dinner at "ariel's grotto" or something like that.

yesterday, i went out with the girls for lunch at the loft. it was me, lynce, grace, jem, and georgia. it was nice to see everyone again. lovely time. hehe. after lunch, grace and i just went to the mall and to target. that was my day. and today, i'm home...doin' nothing.

i've been contemplating on whether or not i should go back to school...whether or not i should get my masters or another degree in a different field. no matter what, the degree that i "may" get will coincide with the degree i already have. that way, i didn't get my bachelor's for nothing. so, yeah...i still have some contemplating to do! hehe. i just don't like the pressure that i get from some people. oh well. the past 2 days, i've been staying at my brother's house in long beach. my bro and sis n law went to cancun for their first year wedding anniversary so i decided to just hang out at their house...feed the dog, water the grass/plants, and feed the fish. i had a good time even if i didn't do much. it was just my "alone" time which is cool. actually, vanessa came and visited me. since it wasn't my house, i didn't want her to spend the night, (and i told her that), but what did she do? she spent the night. haha...i didn't want to be mean but i kinda was just waiting for her to leave. well, we didn't sleep until around 5am and she didn't leave until around 7:30am. oh well...i just thought it would be nice of her to acknowledge that i didn't want her to spend the night but she didn't say one word about it. whenever she comes to my anaheim hills condo, it's kind of a "given" that she will spend the night...at least most of the time. i guess since we were at my bro's house, i didn't think it was right--------but unfortunately, she didn't care or she forgot??? hmm... so, anyway, i'm home now. i came home just in time for dinner. now my skin is peeling. it has to deal with when i went fishing 11 days ago. i just don't know why i started to peel NOW. wasn't i supposed to peel right after the fishing trip? oh well.

andy and i had a great weekend! we had some stimulating conversations! actually, we were discussing life...our goals and what we want in life! so, what did we do? we ended up looking for homes. it was FUN and exciting! hehe...at the same time, scary...and made me somewhat worried! i'm just afraid i want all these things and wont even get it! well, i guess that's why i gotta work hard NOW! ya...good luck trina! we'll see what happens.

i just got back from fishing with andy, lynce, and jemeline! i had sooo much fun! we went on a boat called "nautilis" which went off from newport beach. i caught a total of around 7 fishes. all of us pretty much caught the same amount! i've gone fishing with andy before but i never wanted to touch the live bait! this time i decided to get down and dirrrty! hehe. i was so proud of myself cuz i got my own bait and put it on the hook! yay for me! i really enjoyed myself! everyone on the boat was so nice. everyone would get excited to see someone else catch a huge fish! the "deck-hands" would always be watching out for us and remind us to change our bait every minute or so! also, whenever we would catch a fish, they would be the ones to take the fish off the hook! i really appreciated them being there! haha...well, that's their job! :) hmm...what else? now i'm just tired and kinda red! i couldn't find my sun lotion so i wasn't being protected! anyway, after our fishing trip, andy and i went to carson to drop some of the fish off to my parent's house. we also stopped by my brother's house in long beach....and then finally to get something to eat. and now i'm home. i just got out of the shower and while i was taking a shower, i kinda felt like i was still on the boat! hehe. what a fun day!

saturday we were supposed to go to a friend's baptism/birthday party but we just didn't. andy ended up getting fitted for the tux for ross's wedding. after that, we went over to laguna bach (?) to check out their reception site. they told us that it was at a park right next to the ritz carlton. for some reason, either i thought it was ghetto or i just couldn't picture it. they said that they were going to have a huge tent. well, when we got there, the view just took my breath away. i told andy before that i liked a tent reception.....the ones that i saw in movies like best friend's wedding. i never ever saw one in person though...that was my first time and i guess i thought they only do those tent receptions in the movies! haha...i was wrong! that place is so beautiful!!!! i can't wait! =) after that, andy and i just went back home and hung out at the pool. the following day, sunday, we stopped by my parents house. since no one was there at the time, we decided to visit justin and kayla. after that, we visited my other neice, kalea. we ended up taking justin and kayla w/ us since they wanted to see their cousin. it was cool hanging out with my cousins. they gave us 3 boxes filled with stuff! hehe. but stuff i don't know what to do with! oh well. our last stop for the night was my brother's house. we had to drop off the stuff that my mom got for him when she went to hawaii. now i'm home. i'm supposed to be doing my homework but i guess i can just do it all tomorrow.

hehe....it seems like i only blog about my weekends. oh well...it's not like i have anything to say. friday andy spent the day fishing with his coworkers while i hung out with andy's friends, joey and kristina. actually, they're my friends too but i guess that's just my way of differentiating between them and my carson friends. hehe. anyway, i went to their house in long beach early afternoon. we had to run some errands and prepare for the wedding shower we were throwing ross and mary the day after (saturday). we bought a bunch of stuff...from party city to michaels....we went everywhere. it took us longer than expected to buy all that stuff. we got so tired. when we got back, we just wrapped up all the prizes and made favors. talk about last minute!!! doing everything the night before is not a good idea. oh well....on to the more important topic...bachelorette party! haha. so, yesterday (saturday) was the wedding shower. since this was kinda a last minute thing, we weren't able to make invitations. it was basically just word of mouth & there were actually a lot of people there. good turn out! the games were just a little too un-organized. we had a few prizes left, so they had a contest on the magic mic (karaoke) and whoever got the highest score wins a prize. they were having fun w/ that. hehe. ross and mary got back from hawaii about a week ago and they brought me some li hui mui seeds and li hui mui covered strawberries. the strawberries were in a huge tub. they brought it to the party and it was a hit! everybody liked it. haha...but no more for trina! hehe. actually, my parents are in hawaii right now and i called my aunt to ask my parents to get that for me. hopefully they can find it...haha.

this week is going by so fast! STOP!!! i need a job...please help me. :( andy and i hung out at the mall today. i'm trying to look for a bridesmaid's dress. andy and i will be in a wedding in october. usually we're supposed to get our dress made but for some reason we haven't gotten the material that we're supposed to use. i'm not sure what we're going to do but just in case...i'm checkin' the stores out! hopefully they'll let us know what's up soon!

so, friday andy wanted to go to carson to hang out with my neice and nephew. before that, we had dinner at 3 brothers in harbor city or whatever city that was. when we got to my cousin's house, kayla was there but justin went out with my bro to a dodger's baseball game. since it was kayla's birthday the following day, we decided to take her out to the mall to see what she wanted as a present. she ended up picking out an outfit from old navy! that was easy...hehe. after that, we just hung out at her house and waited for justin to get back. the following day was kayla's birthday party...so we were off to carson again. the party was pretty fun! we stayed there for a long time. i also went to my other cousin's house to pick something up. when we got there, she showed me some stuff and asked me if i could use it! i'm not going to mention what it is...at least not yet but it kinda got me excited! we got some hook ups. hehe. so, sometime next week, i'm gonna go there with andy and show him all the stuff! =) on sunday, we had more family get-togethers. my auntie is visiting from the philippines so there was a party for her. it was at my cousin's house (dad's side) and i haven't been there for AGES! it was nice to see my cousin's on my dad's side. those are the relatives that i hardly ever see. now a lot of people have kids...and now they're going through school fund raisers. haha...that was the most i've "donated." hehe. today i had to go to one of those usc buildings. i wanted boba since i was near alhambra...too bad i didn't know the exact location. oh well.

happy anniversary to me and andy!! :) 12 YEARS! we didn't really plan on doing anything really...(saving money). we are probably just going to go out to dinner. anyway, there were two nights in a row when andy and i were at the pool...hearing howling noises. at first, i thought a siren (ambulance or fire truck) was passing by...so i thought the howling sounds were dogs. my old dog, max used to do that whenever he heard a siren. but that wasn't it! it was coyotes! the night after, we heard it again! this time it was so freakin' loud! i felt so bad for whatever the coyotes got!!! so, sometime during the weekend, andy was walking coach. he ran into a lady that lived in the same complex we did. she has a poodle named angel. basically, that lady (dorothy), was telling andy what has been happening lately with the coyotes. about a week or 2 ago, there was someone who let their dog go potty. he's trained to do that so basically, he just takes care of his business on the grass closest to their door...without a leash. so, once again, the lady let the dog out. after a few seconds or whatever, she heard some screams and yelps. that lady saw her dog in the coyote's mouth! soooo scary! i don't know what that lady did but somehow the coyote just let that dog go! there was blood all over his neck area! they took him to the emergency vet. thankfully, the dog was okay. the following morning, that same lady just opened her front door and saw a coyote...waiting! i guess that coyote just wanted to finish off his business! I HATE COYOTES!!! another incident that happened... there was someone walking their dog (on a leash), and a coyote came running by and grabbed the dog! once again... I HATE COYOTES! basically, whoever was walking the dog, chased and yelled at the coyote! eventually, he let go of the dog! I HATE COYOTES! andy's sister's dog died cuz of those freakin' coyotes!!! :( now i'm scared to walk coach. before we even got coach, i told andy that i wont walk coach by myself. i got traumatized when i was younger. i was walking my old dog, snowball, and while we were passing by a house, 2 pitbulls just ran out of the house and grabbed snowball by the mouth! my dog almost died! i was so scared. me and my old friend jumped on top of a car! thank god the owners came out and kicked the pitbulls off! so, that's why i can't walk dogs anymore...at least by myself. and if i do walk a dog, it'll be late at night when there's no other dogs around! so, i started to do that more often...walking coach later at night...when it was dark! now they say that we shouldn't do that cuz the coyotes may be around! they also say to especially watch out for white dogs! OH NO! I HATE COYOTES!

friday, andy and i went to california adventure! we just went on two rides and was already on our way home. as we were leaving, we ran into my old jr. high/high school friend...ralph fontela. i kinda know how to swim now! :) andy and i have been hanging out at the pool 4 nights in a row! i used to be scared. i always wanted to stay next to the wall of the pool. so, andy decided to get me a boogie board. hehe. i think that's what helped me get over my fear cuz i was able to hang out in the middle of the pool. on saturday, i wanted to get goggles so i can keep my eyes open under water. we went to chics in yorba linda. that place is really an outlet...w/ really CHEAP stuff. unfortunately, they didn't have goggles. the good part is...i bought a ROXY bikini bottom for $1.97. how cool is that? hehe. we ended up getting my goggles at sportmart. after that, we decided to check out the filipino fair in san pedro. it was pretty cool. we didn't get to stay that long cuz we had to go to my bro's house for a birthday party. anyway, we wanted to get my neice, kayla one of those pinay shirts for her birthday. too bad i forgot my wallet. hehe. so, we were off to my bro's house. they had some pretty good food! my brother is having fun with his barbecue grill! so yummy. after the party, we went home and then went back to the pool. hehe. sunday (today) we woke up late. i'm taking a computer class and a spanish class so i wanted to check borders out to see if the books were cheaper there (plus i had a gift card). i found it on their website but i didn't find it at the actual store. i also had to go to the bank to deposit some money...and what happened? the freakin' atm ate my card! i have to go to that bank to see if i can get it back. so sad. since the bank was at the same plaza as chicks, i decided to check it out again! hehe....i ended up buying a ralph lauren suit for $6. now i'm home and andy and i are going to have a barbecue! yay.

thank goodness for the labor weekend. andy and i had a relaxing time. we didn't do anything but hang out at home and just go out for random drives late at night! we also got to hang out at the pool. well, friday we went out to dinner cuz it was kristina and miles' birthday. we celebrated at todai. the following day was jaedine's baptism party. i ended up not going cuz i haven't spent time with my parent's in a long time. how weird. i skipped a party just to spend time with mom and dad! hehe. oh well. andy still went to the baptism while i was headed off to carson. i went to costco with my parents and they took me grocery shopping! yay! after that, we just had dinner at one of those chinese buffets on hawthorne. while we were there, i ran into my ninang! i haven't seen her for many years. less than a month ago, her husband died. i remember cuz my parents went to the funeral. i was surprised to see my ninang there. she seems to be doing pretty good for being a widow! she's a cool and cute person! the things she would say would seem so cute to me! anyway, i guess i was expecting my ninang to be all sad and everything but it seems like she just accepts it! i admire that. i was also surprised cuz she's so different than how my aunt was doing when my uncle died. oh well...everyone deals their own way. after carson, i went to my bro's house to drop some stuff off. i didn't even get home till like 2am. i actually had a fun day! hehe. sunday and monday were the relaxing days spent with my boyfriend. hehe. i know i had more to blog about but i can't remember! oh yeah, today is lynette's birthday and i didn't even get a chance to call her. well, she had a funeral to go to today. i just found out that my other friend's dad passed away and that's the funeral that lynette went to. i wonder what happened.

i had fun yesterday. andy took the day off. i woke up...felt better (as usual). but again, as usual, as the day goes by, my cough comes back. since i've been sick, i called my dad and asked him if he can make me arroz caldo. umm...don't know if that's the correct spelling. anyway, so i was kinda excited to go to carson just for that. andy and i got there and we had that for lunch. it was so yummy! =) after our lunch, we went across the street to my auntie's house cuz i wanted to see how she was doing on my dress. if i didn't mention it earlier, she is making a bridesmaid's dress since i'll be in ross and mary's wedding. well, she hasn't even started and the wedding is on november 15th. hehe. she's aware of that and sure she'll finish. we'll see! haha. so, we were finally off to the wayne brady show. we had to wait outside for a bit. eventually we were able to go inside. we got a pretty good seat (2nd row) but we were off to the side...so we weren't on tv as much. oh well. it was pretty fun. they just want you to be loud and look happy. i was kinda having a hard time since i have a cough. i made sure that each time we taped a segment that i had a cough drop in my mouth. hehe. anyway, between the breaks, the "audience warmer-upper" wanted to play games. he divided the audience into two groups and picked 4 people from each group. if the people from my section win, our section will get candy. well, he had these spoons tied to ropes. they were supposed to put it down their shirt, down their pants, and then up the other person's pants and up their shirt...and so on....isn't that gross? what if the spoon touched their private parts or if a pube falls out. it was kinda hard esp. since a lot of girls wear tight jeans. one of the guys ended up just taking his pants off...and we saw his boxers. thank god nothing was exposed. hehe. well, eventually both sections got candy. oh well. anyway, vanna white was there. she was actually wearing jeans and a nice top. very casual. she looks good like that instead of wearing all those fancy gowns. she's promoting or endorsing these hanes sweats. supposedly you can wipe off any stain so they squirted her w/ cranberry juice. she just wiped off a part of it. haha...don't know if it's all that good but she gave a sweater to everyone in the audience. i wanted to hooded one but for some reason they didn't give it to me. i just got a regular purple sweater...and i gave it to my mom. the micro machine kids were there. they were talking so freakin' fast. i guess since they were there, they gave us a few micromachine toys. it's pretty big. and finally, mandy moore was there. she's pretty. she also performed. i was kinda disappointed. i was hoping she's give us a cd! haha...i know i was expecting too much. i just figured... since we got all this free stuff, why not add a cd? hehe...only kidding. well, we ended up staying there for 2.5 hours. it wasn't too bad. we went back to my parent's house and had dinner there. my dad packed the arroz caldo for me! =) that'll last me a few days. hehe. so, now i'm back home and i'm still freakin' sick. help me.
dang...what's wrong w/ me? my throat is killin' me and i'm so itchy! what's up w/ that? next thing to do: FINALLY make an appointment to see the doctor.

wow...it's been the longest time ever since i last blogged. i kinda have been busy AND SICK! i've been sick for a while. it started off with a cold. i tried to take care of myself but there were a few activities that i couldn't get away from. by this time, i should be better but my throat is killin' me. and these damn ashes aren't helping. my mom is kinda concerned cuz she always said that i have weak lungs. oh well. at least i'm not a smoker! hehe. so anyway, i've been busy doing lots of stuff but i can't really blog about it...mostly cuz i can't remember everything. this past weekend (saturday), i went to a family-friend's wedding! it was alright... when i went up to do the bouquet toss, i ran into my old high school friend...michelle. we ended up talking and kinda didn't realize that the bride had already tossed the bouquet! hehe. we both just looked at each other...knowing we looked familiar but kinda had a hard time remembering. at the end, we remembered! haha. i can't believe it's almost november! the time is going by so fast and then 2004 will just pop up! how sad! it's going to fast for me. hehe. i'm excited for this month since a friend of mine will be getting married! till then, we're off clubbing this weekend before the big day! i was actually supposed to clubbing w/ her last weekend, but i was sick! =( well, besides, trina is poor! oh ya, this weekend should be exciting for me but i can't say yet! ;) hmm...what else? wednesday andy took the day off. we are going to the wayne brady show! mandy moore and vanna white will be there. hehe. since it's free...why not?! we might also go to a taping of that new show, coupling. i really like that show. i just don't know how long we'd have to stay there! okay...well, i'm tired and i really need my rest! i hope it stops raining ashes soon!

so, yeah, we ended up picking up the kids to go to chuckee cheese for ritche's kid's bday. since we brought some kids with us, we decided to get there early and order our own pizza. well, lynette and her kids were also in town so i asked them if they wanted to go to chuckee cheese. of course the kids wanted to go...so i got to see them! yay! ;) lynce also came along! it was cool to see everyone. at one point, i kinda felt weird since lynette and them weren't really invited...but it's not like we crashed their party...i ended up asking andy if he thought it was rude how we "invited" other people to chuckee cheese. he said it wasn't....esp. since we had our own stuff...(pizza/tokens). oh well.

andy and i went to california adventure for a few hours. we were supposed to meet his friends over there but they got there around 7pm and we were supposed to go to my brother's house for dinner. he had a barbecue galore! it was cool. we found out some incredible news.....but i still can't say anything yet! oh well. today, we're going to carson and to chuckee cheese for a friend's kid's birthday. the kids...justin and kayla wanna go so we're gonna be there just a little before the party starts and we'll just get our own pizza or something. okay that's it.

it's like christmas came early this year! a lot of people probably already started their christmas shopping. anyway, a few years ago, my family started a tradition for thanksgiving. every year we vote on a theme. so far we've done the country theme, the pajama theme, the patriotic theme, and this year is the college sweatshirt theme. i have a csuf sweater but for some reason, i don't wanna wear it. i actually wanted either pepperdine or ucla since those were the schools i wanted to go to. i'll probably have to settle for csuf. i have no clue with what andy will be wearing. i'm sure the majority of sweatshirts worn will be from csulb. that's where all my cousins went. hehe. saturday i went to dayton's baptism party...(jackie's son). he got baptised here instead of new york. i just saw jackie and her son about a month ago....they will be back again around christmas time! wow...lotsa traveling! andy couldn't go to the party cuz he had to help his friend move into his new house. so, i ended up going with grace. poor grace, she gets frustrated and stressed out with her son gavin! at times, he seems very fussy so she gets frustrated. i finally was able to see jason and maureen's kid, melia. she's so cute. it's funny...a lot of people who have a baby together would ask the other person to hold the baby. with this couple, i could hear them kinda fight over who's gonna hold melia. so beautiful! hehe. anyway, i have witnessed yet another proposal! MINE! yeah right! anyway, they wanted all the ninangs/ninongs to take a group picture together. eventually the crowd slowly vanished and the only two people who were left at the spot where they were taking pics were jackie's cousin, aimee and g. i guess they planned that all out. he gave her roses and talked about the symbolism of unity...and two families uniting. he had a beautiful speech. and then....he went down on his knee and popped the question! it was so cool. but you know me, i became very bitter! haha...just kidding. lynce and i were just asking each other, why can't our guys do that for us? hehe. oh well. so, after that i stopped by grace's house and was on my way home. i called andy to find out if he was done helping out his friend. they were actually on their way out to dinner so i decided to tag along! hehe. we ended up going to todai in orange! so, andy's friends (miles and patty) just got a new house. it's a huge 5 bedroom house. i haven't been there yet but it's really far...in corona. i heard that you can smell the cows over there but supposedly they will be eventually moving em. hmm...i wonder if that's where we'll end up moving! hehe. i guess i wouldn't mind. i just dont wanna drive in traffic all the time, i don't want that stinky smell, and i just don't like being that far away from everyone! corona's not actually far from where i am but it gets really trafficy on the freeway. today (sunday) was jack's birthday! we went out to dinner at joe's crab shack. i pretty much saw everyone that i saw yesterday...except for lynette. i barely see that girl so it was nice to see her. her kids are so CUTE! anyway, that was pretty much my day! now i gotta do the laundry. laterz...

warning! long blog! hehe. i've been so busy the past few days. thursday: was rehearsal dinner for ross and mary's wedding. did i ever mention how many sponsors they have? they have about 26! isn't that crazy? well, i think that's a lot! after the rehearsal, we ate at a chinese restaurant. they gave out gifts to those in the wedding party. they got me pearl earrings, necklace, and a bracelet! it was really nice. the only problem was that my mom just bought me these dangling diamond white gold earrings...and i wasn't gonna wear em anymore....just cuz mary got us the pearls. andy got a gift certificate to fry's! good gifts! hehe. after dinner, we actually went clubbing. yeah, my cousins throw this club in long beach. he gave me a few free passes so there was about 11 of us that tried it out. that club was empty! they said it's cuz they didn't really do any promotions that week. after some time, more people started to show up. the first drink we had were tequila shots. everyone did a toast for ross and mary. it was kinda nasty...but then again, i'm very weak at taking shots. i can never swallow the whole shot. i have to take 2 shots...or shall i saw 2 sips. hehe. after that, andy kept getting us a few more drinks. i was starting to feel really good! everyone had fun. i was so glad...esp. since we took em out. andy and i just wanted to party with the bride and groom before the actual wedding. also, because mary has been stressing lately and she deserved to relax! after a while, she got really messed up. she closed her eyes, and then there was a downfall!! she threw up at the patio section of the club. afterwards, mary mentioned that she was hungry and she wanted to go out. we ended up going to denny's but everyone fell asleep on the ride there. so, basically, the only people who ate out was me, andy, joey, and kristina. oh ya, before we even got to the restaurant, I ended up throwing up! yUCK! oh well...it was a FUN night and i'm glad that the bride and groom had a great time as well. friday i woke up really early with a bad head ache. i felt like i wanted to throw up again but it just wouldn't come out. i was feeling nasty...i just wanted to go back to sleep so i wouldn't feel the pain. i ended up taking tylenol and thank god, i was able to get back to sleep. after a while, i woke up feeling refreshed! yay. so, after that, andy and i went to the mall to finally get a wedding gift for ross and mary. we then had to rush home cuz andy hasn't even gotten his tux yet! i also had to meet up with the girls cuz mary wanted us to get our nails done together. we got it done at some place called arlene's beauty salon in huntington beach. i've never gotten my nails done before so i was kinda nervous! hehe. the place looked very trendy! you get to sit in a comfortable chair and have your feet soaked. i wouldn't mind getting my nails done more often. they clean up your nails, cuticles, etc. i just wanna find out more details on the cleanliness! hehe. they looked pretty clean but i guess you'll never know! ya, eventually i wanna go with my mom or something. i ended up getting the french manicure. mary also wanted the guys to get their nails done too but i guess they were too MAN about it! hehe. i had fun though! a lot of us were still tired since we went clubbing the night before. so, i was waiting to find out how much it was but mary paid for EVERYONE! thanks mary! =) after getting nails done, i went to get some food and then was on my way home. while i was getting my nails done, andy went out with the groom to run a few errands. ross wasn't even done with the slide show! talk about last minute! hehe. the wedding stuff was supposed to be done by thursday night...and that's why ross was able to go clubbing w/ us. hehe. apparently, he wasn't done yet and finished the morning of the wedding. isn't that crazy? anyway, mary and ross got hotel rooms. one for the guys and one for the girls. mary wanted all the girls to be together. that's why i kind of got worried that there wouldn't be much room for me. kristina and i decided to just stay at my place. when we visited mary at the hotel, it was just her and her cousin? what happened to her other bridesmaids...her maid of honor? they ended up getting another room! so, i kinda felt bad or wondered if she was sad that no one was there! but i think she was good! we spent time with her and kept telling her to just get some rest. since only two people spent the night, she was able to fully relax...i guess. so, yeah, joey and kristina ended up spending the night with us since they live in long beach. we were getting our hair and make up done on the wedding day so i had to wash my hair at night. i ended up going to sleep around 4am. saturday we all got our hair and make up done at a salon called alexander's in anaheim hills. i've never been there before but the place is great! it's a huge place...along with a coffee place. i usually never know where to get my hair/make up done but this will probably be the place. they do everything in that salon. i don't know how much they charge though (since mary paid for it again) but i heard that they were kinda pricey! one of the girls used to go there before she moved to arizona and said that they do a really great job! it might be kinda pricey (like regis) but it's worth it! i actually didn't want an up-do because of my fat face but i heard that mary wanted our hair to be up! but they did a good job...both with my hair and make up. yay...i finally didn't look like a transvestite! these people are young and trendy so they know what's in! hehe. thanks again mary! =) after getting all pampered up, kristina and i went back home to get dressed. we had to meet everyone in the hotel cuz the limo was gonna pick us up. we got an excursion! it was pretty cool. all the girls were so excited!!! when we got there, we went into the bride's room. the church coordinator was kinda mean but mary asked if she can have a moment with the bridesmaids. she said beautiful words...how thankful she is, etc. it lasted for just a few seconds cuz we had to get out of there. haha...but we kept telling her to stop because we were all teary eyed! but those were nice words to say. it's always nice to say those kinds of things especially since during the whole preparation of the wedding, she's busy and focused on what she needs to do. it's nice to know she really appreciates us! the ceremony was beautiful. it makes me so excited for mine...but still don't know when that'll ever be. reception was next to ritz carlton in laguna. it was actually really close to the beach. a while ago, we went to their reception site to check it out. it was breath taking...but i wouldn't recommend doing that in november. it was so freakin' cold! not only that, it's so close to the beach that the shuttle has to take you there. the wait was kinda long esp. since it was cold. they had an open bar but i didn't want to drink because the bathrooms were so nasty! oh well. a few things weren't as organized as it should be but through it all, when i look at the bride and groom, it wasn't about the whole reception...it was about them two. they weren't worried that something was out of place. they were into each other! that just melts my heart! that's what makes the whole wedding beautiful...to me at least. anyway, the money dance was coming up and we got change at the bar. andy was busy getting the slide show ready but i wanted me and andy to dance with both the bride and groom since we're close to both of em. melinda (the sister) was wondering what we were doing so she wanted all the friends to dance with the groom. so, we pinned some money on ross and then another song came on...it was "that's what friend's are for!" PERFECT SONG! we formed a huge circle and danced with each other. the bride came in too! it was so cool. hehe...we all started singing that song. i thought that was a beautiful moment too! so, the reception was over and we needed a ride since we all took the limo. mary's parents has a 15 seat van so they said we can go with them. they had to carry a few things so it took longer than expected. it was cold and after the reception, it was raining so freakin' hard! thank god it wasn't during the reception. everyone was so tired! the trip back home seemed like forever. now the wedding is over...i'm tired but it was still beautiful! sunday we went to ross's house for the gift opening. i thought they were gonna have a lot of food but they didn't. actually, they had a lot of pig and i don't eat that. hehe. after ross's, we went to trader joe's and then went back home. i slept earlier...and that's why i'm still awake now. oh well.

hello again. i'm doing pretty good with my daily posts huh? it's cuz i did a lot and i guess i just don't wanna forget it. that's pretty much why i blog in the first place. i basically don't talk about what i think about certain things as much as what i do...when i do anything at all. hehe. saturday, andy and i went to LA with my aunt and my mom. we just wanted to check a few places out. my aunt wanted to go shopping for something she needed while i wanted to look for shoes for the wedding next week. well, she wanted to go on her own...and it took us a while to find her!!! geez...it was so freakin' irritating. and that place was so crowded! we were also kind of in a rush cuz we were gonna go to my nephew's birthday party with my brother. eventually, we got home and i had to wrap the gift i got for jason. the party was at carriage crest park so it wasn't too bad from my parent's house. so, we got to hang out with my family (dad's side). we hardly ever get to spend time w/ that side of the family. basically, i think my mom kind of brain washed me and my brother. but now that we're older, we are trying on our own to be closer to that side of the family. after that party, we had another family party to go to. it was for my aunt and uncle (on my dad's side). one person was retiring and it was the other person's birthday! it was pretty cool. there was a lot of people. of course, it's always nice to run into family! =) one of my urlLink cousins from san francisco was also here so we were able to hang out with him. the party was good...they had a lot of entertainment and got the crowd involved. they also had a pretty cool center piece. they had a bowl with a beta fish and on top of that, they had orchids. basically, the whole thing just looked like a vase with orchids...until you look closer and find the fish. hehe. they also had give aways with the small cute martenilli apple ciders with a small glass. and then they put it in this cute little silver pail. we kind of took more than what we were supposed to. oh well...those were left overs anyway. since we NEVER really hang out with the "de los reyes" cousins, we decided to do more hanging that saturday night. michael (the guy from frisco) actually stayed an extra day just so we can all hang out. so, after the retirement/birthday party, we were gonna meet up to figure out what we were gonna do. meeting time was 11:30pm. andy wanted to go home so we can change and walk the dog. first, we met up with my brother and he drove us to my cousin's house. we then hopped into the expedition and was off to some bar in hollywood!!! one other thing to remember...i was the only girl! 6 guys and 1 girl! it was kinda weird...esp. since i don't really hang out with these guys. when i was younger, they were the "bad" cousins...the bad influences. and that's why my mom didn't want us to hang out together. hehe. anyway, michael met some girl at the party we just came from and she met us at the bar. we were on our way in but then the security or bouncer (whoever that is) saw how many guys were with us and he just wouldn't let us in. so, basically that girl decided to take us to another bar that was walking distance. we walked into an alley that smelled like PEE! we walked in where there were tables that were filled and then walked into the bar/club area where it was freakin' hot. it was so crowded in there so we decided to just hang outside. hehe. no one drank...we were basically just there for my cousin...that wanted to get hooked up. hehe. so, he was the only one inside while the rest of us were just talking outside. back in the day, some of the cousins that i was with that night were gangsters. it was actually the first time andy got the chance to really talk to these guys. andy ended up saying something like...when we first got together and we would see you around, trina would hide because she was scared of you and that you would do something to me!!! hehe. i kinda got embarrassed when andy told him that cuz i didn't want him to know that i was scared of him. but ya, he said that he wouldn't have done anything to andy! hehe...sounds funny. but andy got mixed up. i was kinda scared of my other cousin (who already passed away). i was scared of him because a long time ago (sometime in junior high) when i wasn't with andy yet, i was walking home from school. i was walking home with some friends--crystal, leonard, and rafael. well, they were walking too slow so i decided to just walk ahead of em and go on my merry way HOME! so, they were walking behind me and those guys decided to just kick some small rocks towards me to get my attention or something. i guess i was tired cuz i just felt like ignoring them. it's not like they were hurting me or anything...we just play around and do stupid stuff. so, yeah, they knew i was just ignoring them. as i was walking, i was passing by my cousin's house. even at that time, i already started to fade away from my cousins cuz my mom didn't want me to be involved in gangster $hit! when i was walking passed their house, i saw my cousin with a brown towel but for some reason (mostly cuz i was scared of him), i decided to not look at him, not say hi to him, & to just pretend that i didn't see him at all. i guess my cousin saw those guys kicking rocks towards me and i guess he was mad. from what i heard, he grabbed those guys, pushed them down, and was threatening them with the towel around their neck. it's not like he punched em or anything...but basically he said to watch out if they were to ever hurt me! umm...i guess that was a threat? i didn't know this was going on because i had already turned the corner and didn't even hear anything. this is probably mean, but i guess i'm glad that i didn't see my cousin with those guys. would i have been traumatized? the following day i saw those guys, rafael and leonard. he told me what happened and i was so freakin' scared. i was scared cuz my cousin was a gangster and so was rafael! i was in the middle. luckily rafael was nice about it. it's not like he threated me or anything. i basically apologized about my cousin since he shouldn't have gotten into my business like that...and it's not like rafael and them were being mean. oh, by the way, rafael was my boyfriend...in elementary school that is. hehe...i don't really count him as a real boyfriend though. my first boyfriend was DON! hehe. okay, back to that other subject....i was so thankful that rafael was still cool about it. i wonder what he's up to these days. i know that when we got into highschool, he became more of a hardcore gangster. anyway, ever since my cousin got into gangs, i was scared of him...maybe it's cuz of my mom and i was just too young to even have my own opinion about it...but i was scared of him that i've never even confronted him or asked about what happened or what he did with my friends. so sad...so sad especially knowing that he died around the time of 9-11-01. he died right before 9-11. i was surprised to hear of his death, yet at the same time, i wasn't surprised. it's the kind of lifestyle he lived. another thing i was sad about was that, he died and then right after that, the terrorist attacks happened. i didn't have time to really grieve for my first cousin...because the attacks already gave me a horrific and terrible feeling inside of me. anyway, we're all grown up now and my other cousins grew out of the gangster phase...at least i hope so!!! that night out with the guyz was crazy. my cousins can be so blunt. even if the way they were talking was rude, it was kind of cool. i was able to see how guys really talk! basically michael didn't put a move on that girl he wanted to hook up with. he didn't want anything to happen.......cuz he didn't wanna leave her hanging! after all, what's he supposed to do? F- HER and then go back home to frisco? a lot of guyz would say yeah but he didn't wanna be rude like that. i guess that's why my cousins were making fun of him. they were making fun of him so BAD! it was funny though! it was a night to remember. we ended up getting home at around 5:30am. hopefully, we'll have more opportunities to hang out with that side of the family! today, sunday we went to csuf titan student union. it was my cousin's mom's first year death anniversary! andy and i were so tired! hehe...my brother was tired too. after that, we went home and just hung out the rest of the day. now i'm done! =)

today, andy and i did some chores and ran a few errands. i actually wanted to go to disneyland but we just didn't. we went this past wednesday and i had so much fun. mostly because it wasn't too crowded...we were able to go on all the rides we wanted to without getting a fast pass. they already decorated the disney resort all "christmas-y." it makes me so excited that christmas is just around the corner....but then...i don't have money! oh well. and finally i was able to check out the haunted mansion! i guess every year at this time, they decorate it to make it look like a scary christmas....and based on the movie, nightmare before christmas. (is that the movie?) it was pretty cool...it's nice to see a change! =) so, today, andy and i were supposed to buy a few frames for our house @ ikea. at the end, we decided not to---$ave money! we met up with andy's friend's at chili's for dinner before our movie--(matrix) started. well, if you ask me, i'm not a big fan of the matrix. actually, i've never watched matrix 1, 2, or 3. but i still decided to go just to go out with the gang. so, andy and joey decided to go to the car to put our left over food away while we already go to the theater. so, we wait for awhile. and finally they get there. they took awhile because they ran into a few friends--melinda and ronald. we're also close friends with them and didn't even know they were going out to a movie. they were gonna watch love actually. apparently, ronald didn't really wanna watch love actually and would rather watch the matrix. so, what do ya know? ronald and i just swapped ticket stubs. ross and mary also joined us! that movie was really good! go watch it! hehe. by the time we got out of watching love actually, andy and ronald have been waiting for about 45 minutes! poor babies. they were actually kinda disappointed in the matrix...but do i care? hehe. there seems to be a lot of events for tomorrow!! in the morning, my mom wants me and andy to take her to LA. since i'll be there, i wanted to just check out if they have any nice shoes for the wedding that's coming up. after that, we gotta go to a birthday party for my nephew. after that, there's another party for my auntie and uncle (a retirement party and a birthday party), and now, we just got a message on our machine saying it's andy's little neice's birthday and they're having a surprise birthday party! i don't know how old she'll be (5 years old?) but it's so cute to just imagine having a surprise party for a little girl! hehe. i hope we can pack all this in for tomorrow. oh yeah, i also want to go to pala. =)

yesterday i had another interview. i, again, have a lot to compete with...one position against several other people! i was supposed to have the interview last friday (halloween) but my throat was still hurting pretty bad and i didn't wanna cough that much during the interview. hehe. thank god, she let me reschedule for yesterday (tuesday). for the interview, the lady asked me to do a presentation on whatever topic i wanted. well, when i was in school, i did a whole curriculum on asthma for senior citizens. i was thinking of doing it on asthma but then i didn't want my presentation to be boring. i decided to do car seat safety. i did my research...mostly online. it was actually really interesting. so, i did my presentation on my laptop...using powerpoint. and i also brought in a car seat with a bear inside to do a little demonstration. yup, i actually went to target to buy a car seat. i guess i could've borrowed it from one of my cousins but i just didn't. at least i am gonna return my car seat today. hehe. on my way up to the building, i felt weird. i could just feel the people looking at me with a car seat and a bear inside...all buckled up. haha. did you know that 8 out of 10 kids restrained in car seats are not buckled in correctly? just thought i'd throw that in. hehe. after my presentation, she said that i did really well, that i presented the material really well, and that i seemed very comfortable with the topic. she was also asking me questions while i was in the middle of my presentation. luckily i was able to answer her questions. that made me look like i really knew what i was talking about. hehe. after the presentation, we went on with our interview. i thought i did alright....it's just the thought of having a competition against more people for just ONE freakin' position. well, we'll see.

happy belated halloween! i was still kinda sick but we still went to my cousin's house in carson. we usually go there every year. it's kinda funny cuz we're probably the only BIG group that goes trick or treating with just 3 little kids. it's just fun going with the kids while all of my cousins just go walking together and talk. hehe. well, this year, i went for about half a block but then i was getting too cold and i didn't want to get sick even more. i just decided to go back to the house. oh well. anyway, i read on another blog about how good wingstop in carson was. i've been wanting to give it a try but never had a chance until halloween. i just wanted to bring some food to my cousin's house so we ordered a few pieces for everyone! it was really good. thanx fellow blogger. haha. so, saturday i was having a surprise bachelorette party at my place for mary. andy and the other guys were also having a bachelor party in a hotel. mary was so freakin' surprised! she came over cuz we were "supposedly" going clubbing that night. she was also surprised since her sister (who lives in chicago) was there! the surprise didn't get ruined....it's just that the pizza delivery guy and mary came at the same time!!!! okay...am i ghetto? each girl that was a bridesmaid had to bring a dish. well, the cousin brought lumpia but then by the time they cooked it at my house, it was too defrosted. when they put it in the oil, it just broke apart. they decided to just go ahead and order pizza. so, she called and ordered the pizza. finally, the pizza arrived...and the cousin didn't even offer the money. i'm probably just ghetto just cuz i don't have that much money. well, i ended up asking them if they were gonna pay for it. hehe......so, they ended up paying for it. geez...what a ghetto trina. i guess i would've paid for it if i HAD to. no big deal!!! anyway, mary was so surprised. she had no clue! thank god for ross for helping me out in getting her to my place. at the end, it all worked out nicely. we were all trying to get her drunk really fast but she drinks really slow. hehe. i guess shots would've been better. we wanted her to be relaxed by the time the stripper got there! hehe. eventually the stripper got there. he was alright. he did his show...but he just talked too much and was being sarcastic. my dollar bills left my pocket so fast---too fast that i actually ran out. don't worry...it's not cuz i spent a lot. before the party, andy and i decided to have $50 each...in single dollar bills. he went to the bank and got some change. i wasn't planning on using the 50 singles---we wanted to have that much just in case some of the girls didn't have any change. so yeah, i was the change lady. i totally ran out of singles after that first stripper!!! and i thougt it was a rip off. nope...i didn't like him too much. mary was a little nervous but she still had fun!!! well, we had an hour time lapse when the SECOND stripper would come. mary didn't even know that a second stripper was coming. hehe. i was kinda nervous cuz i didn't even have anymore single bills. i ended up going to ralps (yay ralphs) for change. by the time i got back, the second stripper just arrived. perfect timing! hehe. the second stripper was so much better!!! he got the crowd more into it. when he got there, i just gave mary a shot to loosen her up! IT WORKED! she had so much fun! i had so much fun!!! my gosh...what a crowd pleaser. he ended up coming as a cop! so, he kinda did a little skit...trying to arrest and search! hehe. he wanted us to do put a dollar bill over whoever so that they can get a dance. it was so funny. a lot of these girls were shy. they were laughing so hard...sometimes even saying...ewwww gross! haha. anyway, someone put a dollar over me so it was my turn. he was actually doing motions as if we were having sex. i was kinda embarrassed w/ the first stripper but since i liked this stripper a lot more, i decided to kinda act the part. i was moaning/laughing...saying yeah baby! hehe. it was fun. the stripper was ending his show and said that he also does private shows...one on one. and to give him a call and everything. so he was about to leave........but one of the girls asked if he can give mary a private show NOW! it cost 20 bucks! haha...so they went into the bedroom and did their thing! i'm pretty sure the stripper was happy! more money! he finally was ready to leave....he was thirsty too so we offered him a drink. he eventually left! boy oh boy was mary surprised. she totally didn't see that second stripper coming. but everyone was happy just cuz he was so much better than the first one. haha. after a few people left, some of the other girls actually wanted to go to the bachelor party. i didn't really wanna take any part of that cuz i didn't wanna be rude. i didn't wanna ruin the guys' party. but everyone got drunk too fast. they had their strippers earlier than we had ours so their party was kinda over...esp. since everyone was messed up. that's when i decided to go. the girls were actually not planning on ruining their party but we were just gonna hang out some more and get our own room. well, we saw the guys and everyone was knocked out. after some rest, the girls were pretty much sober. andy was actually supposed to spend the night in the hotel but too many guys threw up and it smelled so bad. not only did they throw up but they threw up on the floor. and one of the guys kept spittling on the floor. so, it worked out good ......no one stayed at the hotel except the really drunk ones. haha. oh yeah....for the bachelorette party we had a few games. kinda ghetto but i had A LOT of prizes to give away. it was so fun. a lot of people didn't know what certain things were and we were just looking at em trying to figure out what it does and where it goes. they were thinking that i was kinky when in fact, i had no idea what a lot of things were!!!! ya, my cousin hooked me up with a lot of stuff. he gave me 3 boxes filled with stuff that i gave away at the party! i was actually considering selling em on ebay but i just never did. some of those prizes were worth $100! i also made these goodie bags filled with condoms, keychain, lubricants, lotions, massage oils...blablabla. each girl probably took home at 3 or 4 prizes and they were trading things that they got in the goodie bags. it was so funny. so, back to the guys' party! andy and i were on our way home and he was telling me what happened at their party. some people get jeolous but i guess i'm different. we're able to be open about it. but OH MY GOSH! i can't say anything specific in here.....all i can say is....really expensive. =) man, this blog is so long and i still have to talk about sunday! hehe. sunday, we ended up waking up around 10am. for the party, we put coach in one of those dog hotels. haha...i think she was at a vet that lets pets stay overnight. so, when we woke up, andy went to go pick her up. i missed her so much! hehe. i'm so glad she's back!!!! anyway, there was some talk about having a barbecue at my house and then we all go to church together. well, no one was able to get a hold of mary. we were thinking that she was just sleeping or she was mad @ ross. so, we ended up not having anything! andy and i just ate the left overs for lunch. after that, we were watching how to lose a guy in 10 days...but fell asleep in the middle. we were just tired!! by the time i woke up, i had to get ready for the 5pm mass. andy and i are usually about 90% late. we don't mean to but it just ends up that way. i don't like to be late cuz i wanna be able to sit! hehe. but yeah, we were late again and we didn't get a seat. but then we saw ronald and told us to come his way. everyone was actually there! we didn't even plan to go but i guess since there was some talk about it, we all decided to go even if it wasn't definite. did that not make sense? who cares. mary made it sound like the priest that was marrying them wanted us to go to mass together so that he can talk to all of us. but it wasn't even like that. he just wanted us to go to church together...just because---spiritual bonding!
