when we found that out, we all did a group hug. isn't that just priceless? haha...it was cute! after mass, ross and mary took us out to dinner at pho 99. i've never been there. andy got the pho (which is something i've never had) and i got a beef rice plate. mine was pretty good. the pho was good too but i don't like the noodles. so, we finally got home and rested again. actually, i fell asleep at 9pm but i wanted to wake up cuz i have to prepare for something that's due on tuesday. and now i'm just blogging when i'm supposed to be working on my stuff. ok...i'll stop now.

the morning started with us going to church at the 8:30am mass. i was actually proud of all of us cuz we all got ready on time...including justin! we just told him how much time he had to get ready and he timed himself well! hehe. i just felt bad for him cuz we probably woke him up too early. while everyone was asleep, he played playstation till 1am or 2am. crazy huh? anyway, andy and i have never been to mass that early. we ran into andy's parents at church. they were only sitting a few pews away from us. after mass, they took all 3 of us to breakfast @ denny's. justin was actually talking up a storm....after he ate his breakfast. i was surprised cuz a lot of times he wont finish his food if he either drinks too much or cuz he just talks too much. this time he actually finished his food without talking as much. but after he was done eating, that's when it started! hehe. we already wanted to leave but then he kept telling us more stories. we probably left like 10 minutes after we initially wanted to leave! anyway, justin is just a comedian. i had fun with justin this weekend. i was telling andy that he was kinda different than he normally would be. i couldn't actually put my finger on it. so, we think it's cuz he was without his sister. he was more mellowed out...just a cool person to hang out with...and most of all, he didn't really have to ask or fight for attention. he usually would have to fight for attention when he's with sister kayla. after church, we went to my parent's house cuz it was my dad's birthday. my dad actually asked if he can have a birthday get together with the family including cousins. after all these years, he has never had a birthday celebration. the most he'd probably get is my mom cooking pancit. i just thought it was cute how my dad wanted a party. hehe. at the same time, i was kinda nervous. i wasn't sure if he wanted to have a get together cuz he had some news....good or bad. my dad is unpredictable so that's the only reason, i was nervous. so, he really just wanted to have it to get everyone together and be happy together. hehe...at least that's what he told me. when we all sang happy birthday to him, he got so emotional...but at the same time laughing! it was funny. afterwards, he opened his gifts and he got all emotional again! thank god he was laughing at the same time! i didn't want him to cry too hard. overall, the party was fun. the cousins basically played video games. we played both old school and new school games! =) we played the old video games w/ like 72,000 games. and we also played with the ps2. my cousin got that new game called eye toy. it's where you hook up a camera and play games. it's really cool. i got a best buy gift card so i'm thinking of picking that up.

pretty good, eh? i've been blogging more often! hehe. anyway, on friday, andy and i went to carson to pick up my nephew, justin. he's been wanting to spend the night at our place! so, we get justin while my other cousin gets sister kayla! hehe. like i said before, kayla and kalea got a lot of their bratz stuff so they wanted to play with it together. usually kayla would spend the night at our place but i guess she just wanted to be w/ the "girls." hehe. so, before we got to anaheim hills, justin wanted to stop by a few stores. we ended up going to main place mall. he ended up buying himself a toy at kay bee's. he was so excited to buy something for himself with his own money. it was his first time! hehe. he also had a $20 gift card to target so we took him there as well. we kept telling him that just cuz he has some money and a gift card doesn't mean he has to spend it all at once. he can just save it for something better in the future. well, he wanted to go shopping. he spent a majority of his money. he got some pokemon toys from target. at least he still has money left in his gift card. hehe. the following day, saturday we went to brea mall. at carlton cards, a lot of their precious moments are 50% off! we wanted this cute one, "we've got this plan down right!" it was so cute. it was their last one but we just decided not to and just save our money! the disney store was having a sale on their dvd's. they were selling ALL their dvd's (new and old releases) for $14.99. we thought that was a good deal since pirates of the carribean at walmart is almost $19.00. finding nemo is $23.00 at target but when it's on sale, it's $19.99. so, we ended up getting pirates...., stitch--the movie, & two lion kings. oh well. the reason why we got two lion kings is cuz my bro and i are gonna trade lion king for finding nemo since he got two of em for christmas! hehe. oh ya, before we got to the mall, we had lunch at costco. they have churros now...@ least at the one in fullerton. it was so good. for dinner, andy picked up pizza at costco. it was then that we found out that ronald was having a surprise get together. originally, andy and justin were gonna go golfing but ronald's birthday thing was at that new bowling alley at the block. i haven't gone to the block for probably a year and so i've never seen that place. bowling is actually FUN! i'd like to do it more often. it's just that it's expensive over there. oh well. justin also played! he's so cute when he throws the ball down the alley! anyway, it's been ages (practically since jr. high/high school) since i last bowled! thank god we found out about the birthday thing!! =) thanks guys for all the fun.

christmas is over! yup...i'm still awake. i got home from all the christmas parties about an hour ago. it was good. this year, we slept in longer than we normally do on christmas day. my old friend don (all the way in japan) gave me a surprise call to wish me a merry christmas and a happy belated birthday. sweet huh? anyway, we got to andy's parent's house kinda early. we hung out for a bit. the thing i dislike about going to different family parties on the same day is that i always feel guilty leaving. it's also kinda weird too cuz we left after the majority of people arrived! it was raining so hard. after hanging out there for a while, we were off to my auntie's house in long beach. it was funny cuz the kids were so excited that we FINALLY arrived. we usually get there around 1 or 2pm but this year we got there at like 6pm. anyway, they weren't as excited to see us cuz they were MORE excited that we were there cuz they couldn't open their gifts until we were there! hehe. so, we had the kids open their gifts first. the girls got A LOT of bratz gifts! after the kids, the cousins did a gift exchange. i told andy that i had melani when in fact, i had HIM! hehe. i guess i tricked him good. i ended up getting him a kenneth cole brief case. after auntie nora's, we were off to another party. actually, it's not necessarily "another" party. it's basically a continuation of the last except it's just with my carson cousins. so, we're still spending time with the same people. my parents and my aunt (across the street) are included in this party...since they don't really go to auntie nora's place. sounds weird, i know but this is just the way it is! =) there were so many freakin' presents! it seems like there are more and more gifts each year! haha. well, if you can guess....it's all mainly for the kids. i was actually surprised at all the gifts my mom gave out. she usually doesn't have that much money....oh well. it was fun. we had another gift exchange w/ the cousins. andy had the same person from auntie nora's and for this party. my bro ended up having me. when we finally got to the last party, it was so windy. we saw a few sparks and we thought it was fire works. well, we looked at it for a while longer and andy noticed that it was the electrical wires that's connected to some kind of box. sparks were flying and it was so bright. we didn't know who to call so andy decided to just call 911. within 2 minutes, they arrived. fast service!! after he made that call, his cell phone said "emergency mode." has anyone ever seen that? does that automatically happen when you make an emergency call? or am i just being ignorant/dumb? =) oh yeah...andy and i decided to open our gifts to each other on christmas eve. i got him season 5 of friends and he got me the sephora make up case that i've wanted. the only thing is that i attempted to put my make up in it and it was too small! we're gonna have to exchange it to get the biggest one! yay! hehe. also, on christmas eve, andy and i went to midnight mass with my parents. of course, we didn't get seats again. but that's okay. after mass, my parents took us out for an early breakfast at norms. i think we do that every year.
merry christmas everyone! ....and have a great and blessed new year!

so, we came back from another christmas party yesterday. andy and i were kinda bored. none of his cousins made it to the party. oh well. christmas day is coming by so fast! i love christmas so much!!! i'm actually getting kind of sad because christmas is coming and it'll just be over........just like that!!! corny huh? i just enjoy the whole season. it's not really about the gifts...i can't really explain it. a lot of people think gifts are really important but i don't think so. some people (adults) even tell each other what they want for christmas just so they can be sure they get what they want. there's nothing wrong with that but i guess i'm just different. i just think it's pretty cool when you get a gift for someone (like for a gift exchange), you try to be creative and just think of what they would want. yeah, i know it gets hard to think of what to get certain people but i think part of the fun is just trying to figure out their personality to see what they'd want or like for christmas. did any of that make sense? hehe. sometimes i get gifts that would make me say, "what the heck?" haha...it's the thought that counts. all i know is that this christmas will be sooo freakin' exhausting for me and andy. at least he got the day off the day after christmas. he was originally supposed to work but he worked it out to where he'll just work jan. 2nd instead. no big deal...we don't do much for new year's anyway. happy birthday don!

GAG GAG GAG! hehe! last night we had a christmas party at miles and patty's new house in corona. omg...when i was little, my family and i would go to lancaster almost every week because one of my uncles owned a chicken farm and my cousin and my other uncle would stay there to take care of the chickens. so, on our weekly visits going to lancaster, it would smell. not a good smell either! hehe. i guess eventually i kINDA got used to it. but anyway, andy and i were on our way to miles' place and the smell reminded me of lancaster! we passed by so many cows! the drive there with the one-lane streets and all the farms right next to you was sooooo lancaster! haha. andy made sure to keep the windows up and to keep the air circulated. when we FINALLY arrived, i got out of the car and i said, "it stinks!" at least you don't really smell anything when inside the house. they have a HUGE house! it's gonna take them a while to fill that place up! it's really nice but i don't think i can live in that area. haha...but you never know. i never thought i'd end up here in anaheim hills. at first, i wasn't sure if they'd get mad if they kept hearing people say how bad the smell was. but they were kinda doing it themselves. the reason why they're taking that smell is cuz the cows will eventually be moving. it'll take between 5-10 years. anyway, the party was fun. i haven't actually seen these guys for a while now. i was able to hang out with mary and melinda a little more at this party. i rarely ever see those girls. pretty much all of andy's close friends are couples so instead of picking individual names for our gift exchange, we did it by couples. and what do ya know? everyone (except for me and andy) gave domesticated gifts...home gifts! hehe. miles and patty gave me and andy and they got us a nice crock pot! we've always needed that! hehe. andy and i had marlo and myna and we got them nike sweaters! hehe....we didn't know what else to get them. ya...but it was so funny that everyone else got domesticated home gifts! last weekend, andy and i bought a new ps2 game. it's called karaoke revolution (very similar to dance dance revolution...w/ the dance pads). this game comes with a mic. and you have to sing on pitch in order to get the points. it's pretty fun! we brought that game to the party and everyone (except for me) was singing! it was hilarious! i think they were so loud that they blew out the mic. cuz at the end it wasn't picking up as well as it normally does! we probably have to get a new one. by the time they were done playing, it was around 2:30am. that's when the rest of us decided to leave. omg...when we got out, the smell was so BAD! kristina and i were actually gagging! i just wanted to get into the car so i wouldn't have to smell it and i was still gagging! YUCK! one of these days, i wanna go there during the day so i can actually see all the cows and whatever animals were there. it was hard to see esp. since it was dark.

i think i lost my tiffany bracelet! i got that as a gift and i'd feel so bad if i really did lose that bracelet. i'll try looking for it again! i think i only misplaced it somewhere in my house...at least hopefully. anyway, wednesday (my birthday), andy and i kinda started our day off late. he woke up kinda late since he watched lord of the rings the night before. around noon time, we headed over to disney. we had lunch at the rain forest cafe. after that, we walked around downtown disney for a while. he wanted to buy me something from sephora but surprisingly i didn't find anything i really liked. i guess that's a good thing! hehe. we finally headed over to disneyland. we didn't even ride on any rides...except for the monorail. there was this one girl i saw that had a pink santa hat! i just had a glimpse of it and i thought it was really cute!!! i thought it was like their red one with the mickey ears! anyway, it was sold out @ pretty much all the stores in the park. they said that they might have some at one of the hotels. so, andy and i actually went. we finally found it and it wasn't really what i was expecting. yeah, it was pink but it said princess and there was a crown on top of it. sometimes i can be like a princess (i guess) but i don't like showing that off. hehe. so, i ended up not getting it. by that time, we had to leave cuz we were meeting my family for dinner at tokyo lobby. i was kinda surprised cuz my parents never really take me out for dinner. my dad gave me $27. hehe...i know that's not much but i thought it was cute...since i just turned 27 yrs. old. =) anyway, the food at tokyo lobby was so good. we ordered two boats filled with stuff. it was actually too much food. it was so pretty. hehe. all 7 of us were able to bring a box of food home. that's A LOT! so, after dinner, andy was tired so i just dropped him off and headed over to brea mall. i wanted to go since they closed at midnight and everything at robinsons may was an additional 20% off. i ended up buying two things at a really good price. i'm pretty much done with my christmas shopping. actually, i have one more thing to get. there are so many christmas parties to go to. tomorrow andy's friend is having a party (at his new house). saturday, my friends are having a party at jason's house. we usually have it at lynce's house but they're remodeling their house right now. and finally, sunday we're going to andy's auntie's christmas party. oh yeah...today (thursday), andy's parents took us out to dinner for my birthday! we ended up going to red lobster. it was so sweet of them to take me out. i didn't even expect that. everytime it's someone's birthday in andy's family, they go out to dinner. i'm not even part of their family and they took me out! how nice! =)

happy birthday to ME! happy birthday to ME! happy birthday dear TRINA! happy birthday to ME! hehe. yup...i'm now 27! geez...that's gettin' old! luckily everyone around me is a lot older than i am! =) anyway, i've been meaning to blog but i just haven't gotten to it. now i don't remember what i was supposed to talk about. oh well. right now andy is out with his friends watching lord of the rings. i didn't go simply cuz i don't like that movie! i tried it last year and i didn't enjoy it. that's why i just decided to just stay home and wrap gifts. hehe. oh yeah, we got a tree. we weren't really planning to this year but i guess we just changed our minds. it just wouldn't be the same without a christmas tree. this year my parents didn't get a tree and that kinda made me sad. i actually wanted to buy them one but i don't have money. =(

i'm SICK AGAIN! goshdarnit! andy got sick on wednesday. poor andy, i dragged him with me after he got off of work to find a nice christmas wreath. he didn't tell me he wasn't feeling good. i didn't know so it wasn't my fault! hehe. well, we were unsuccessful at finding a wreath. oh well. i don't think we're gonna get a tree this year. my condo is an okay size but the way they designed it, there's no place to put a tree. that's why i just wanna get a huge christmas wreath instead. okay...back to my other story---- andy got sick on wednesday. he ended up calling in sick the following day. that's when i realized, he was really sick. andy's the type of guy who tries to act like a "man!" he pretends he's fine when he's not. oh well. thursday we went over to his parent's house to watch their dog. we stayed there for a bit. we were thinking of spending the night there but andy didn't wanna spread his germs over there. by the time we got home, i noticed that my throat started hurting and i was coughin up a storm. friday was when it hit me hard. my body was aching, my chest was hurting, head was hurting. i think i had the flu. my temp. went up to 103.3 and that was just earlier today. andy kept telling me to just rest. but i guess to stop myself from feeling the pain, i would put myself to sleep. and then i'd just wake up with the pain again!!! i actually got bored of sleeping! i told andy that i wanted to go out somewhere. so, we took a little walk with coach. that didn't really help. a few hours later, we went to rite-aid cuz i've been wanting ice cream. the ride there and back felt so good. i haven't (pretty much) eaten anything the past two days. i just haven't had the appetite. but the ice cream that i had felt so good. buy the time we got home, i pretty much finished the scoop of ice cream (before i got to the cone). i was already full. i ended up giving it to andy. now i feel so much better. i still feel kinda sick but at least i can do things. my temp. is also back down to 99. YAY! so yeah, that was pretty much my weekend. i was supposed to go to torrance tomorrow for kayla's dance performance. i don't really wanna get anyone sick so i'm choosing not to go. i might just visit my mom. she's kinda sick too so that's okay right? hopefully she'll take me out to lunch. hehe. i'm sleepy now. bye.

i kinda find it hard to believe if anyone ever reads my boring ass posts! i don't even give out my web address. i guess sometimes i get uncomfortable knowing that people i actually know is reading this. hopefully more strangers are reading this rather than people i personally know. haha...who cares right? anyway, i had a very relaxing thanksgiving break! my cousin is a dj and he was throwing a club in hollywood (citywalk). andy and i tried to get all our friends together to go to this club. unfortunately, i was unsuccessful with my friends. they are hardcore clubbers so they wanted to go to mayan. well, it didn't happen and they just ended up going to a few clubs in hermosa beach. ya, they didn't wanna go where i was going because they didn't feel like driving in traffic! boooo!! it wasn't even that trafficy! fortunately, andy was able to get a majority of his close friends to go. we probably brought around 15 people. my brother and sister were there as well. they also brought a few people. yup...just trying to help a cousin out! he wanted the place to be crowded. not only that, we all got in for free! yay! anyway, it was time for the security people to check our id's. andy was before me and they wouldn't let him in. i didn't even notice but andy was wearing nikes! no wonder why my brother and a few other people asked if we had to get dressed up. i was wearing jeans but at least i dressed it up a little. andy was wearing jeans and nikes! geez. so, they wouldn't let him in and told him to buy shoes at one of the stores! so, i asked if he wanted me to go with him but he didn't want me to. he just walked on his merry way! i ran into my dj cousin and he said to switch shoes with someone! so, joey met up with andy out in the smoking lounge and they switched shoes. when andy was finally able to get into the club, andy got his nikes back. haha. at least he got in. i guess that's all that matters! the club was pretty fun. for the most part, the place was packed! i had a few drinks. their drinks were so strong. the music was alright. they actually played new and old stuff. it looked like the crowd was pleased. andy and i stayed until they actually closed. after, i kinda got hungry so we stopped by albertos to get nachos. so, we finally got home and i had a few chips. after that, i decided to go upstairs to check my email. then i said, "i'm not feeling good!" ummm...let's just say i didn't make it to the bathroom! hehe. after that mess, i ran to the bathroom and let a lot more out! YUCK. thanksgiving day, i woke up so freakin' early with a head ache! i just took tylenol and forced myself to go back to sleep. anyway, andy left the nachos we had out on the coffee table. i guess after i threw up he decided he didn't want nachos! haha...understandable. when i woke up, i heard a weird sound. i went to check up on it in the living room. coach was freakin' eating up the nachos! from the looks of it, she ate A LOT! it was funny but i was mad at the same time. i also felt sorry for her cuz i had a feeling that she wasn't gonna feel good. thank god she had no accidents. we had to leave to go to our family parties! first we went to andy's auntie's house in lakewood. then it was off to my auntie nora's house. we ended up staying there till around midnight! friday was our shopping day! i decided not to sleep since we were gonna leave the house really early! so, we finally left the house. i thought radio shack was gonna open at 5:30am or 6 but i was wrong. we ended up just going to cabazon! they had a few good stores there. a lot of places had sales on certain items and then they give you an additional 20% or whatever it may be off your total purchase. it was so crowded. the line for gap was the longest. it actually went out the door. same thing with tommy. after the outlet, we just stopped by circuit city, radio shack, and target. since we were late, we weren't able to get a lot of the cheap stuff that were advertised. oh well. i think i wanna go to the outlet every year! hehe. by the time we got home, i was so tired. every year, ross (andy's friend) has a "day after thanksgiving" dinner. this year i didn't make it cuz i was so freakin' tired! saturday and sunday was when we were finally able to relax. it felt so good. the only thing we did on saturday was go to ross's parent's house in anaheim hills. the whole family went to san jose so they wanted us to house sit and watch their dog. oh yeah, that night andy made the best baked chicken ever! i hope he remembers how he did it. he's the type of guy who experiments. but yeah, it was yummy!

hello. i spent yesterday at the dmv! haha...not really. well, i spent almost 3 hours there. i have to renew my drivers license cuz it expired back in december. i admit...i sent in the form a little late but i know that they cashed in my check and i still haven't received anything. so...i waited and waited for my number to be called. finally it was my turn! i thought everything would be done and over with once i made this visit...but NO!!! the reason why i didn't get my license yet is cuz social security put a hold on it. it looks like they got mixed up with my last name! it shows that it's reyes and not de los reyes! geez...my last name is so complicated. i can't wait to give it up! hehe. so, now i gotta get my birth certificate and social security card. i just don't have time to spend hours and hours at the dmv. i wanted to schedule an appointment but the next time they'll be available is the middle of february. oh well...i MUST deal with it. i added a class last night. i'm just taking classes so i don't forget what i've learned in health education. no big deal! today, i might add another class! we'll see. besides...if i take a class, i get to put off paying my student loan! =) after my class last night, my brother called me asking if andy can do a notary. so, my bro and cousin came over and andy got to do another notary! hehe...if anyone needs something notarized, give andy a call!

i'm at an all-time LOW! i had an interview a few weeks ago and i just found out that i didn't get hired! freakin' AAAAAA! to be honest, i think i did really well at that interview. i had to do another presentation. not only that, i brought in real examples and also made a pamphlet/brochure to go along with the presentation. at first, i was fine doing the presentation...but then the lady was making these facial expressions that made me so nervous. i was just losing hope and thinking.......am i giving out the wrong information or something? it was on std's and i just thought i was screwing up all the information i was giving out. at the end, she said that she was surprised at the information i included in the pamphlet. she said that it basically answered a lot of the questions that the kids usually have! not only that, she was also impressed with the pamphlet itself, the magazine i brought in, and the presentation itself. i got really nervous...esp. when she was making those expressions but at the end, she said that i proved to her that i am comfortable in presenting this information. well, then why wasn't i hired damn it??!! she originally called me regarding a health educator position for high school kids and their parents. unfortunately, i'm not bilingual (spanish) so that plan didn't work. she still wanted me to come in for an interview because she was thinking that she can promote one of the other girls to the high school program while i go to the junior high program...which doesn't require me to be bilingual. at the end, the other girl didn't go to the high school program because she wasn't ready. that just means...i'm out of that position! i was so depressed yesterday! i was just crying and crying! it's been months since i left molina healthcare. i feel so low, disappointed, and so dumb that i haven't even been able to get a job yet! i've also been going to church more often. i usually hardly ever go! i'm still thankful for everything i have but i'm just so depressed.....even kinda embarrassed that i don't have a job. so, for now, i'm just volunteering in the meantime! geez....this was not part of my plan. people ask me why i don't go back to school. it's cuz i'm not positively sure what path to take. i've always wanted a full time job cuz that'll help me see which way i should go. did that make sense? i'm supposed to have a full time job so i can save money with andy for a house. we've been at this condo for almost two years. i feel guilty cuz his parents don't want us to stay here forever. the plan was for us to save during those two years so by that time, we can have our OWN house! i feel bad! i wanna save money cuz i want my own house......and by the way...i wanna get married! my dreams aren't coming true! =(

yesterday, andy and i went to church. they were giving out these baby feet pins to try to stop abortions. the paper that the pin was attached to said something like... this is the size of baby's feet 12 weeks after conception. it was pretty cool. anyway, some of my friends came over yesterday. it was supposed to be a lunch thing but they didn't leave till around 10pm...goshdarnthosepeople! hehe...jk. i had fun. we ended up putting the two dogs in the garage. it was a potluck thing so andy and i had salad and korean bbq. lynce brought popeyes chicken. lynette and keith cooked something up at my house. it was so good. i don't even know what it's called...i think it's a guamanian dish. YUMMY! hehe. the girls basically hung out together while the guys were gambling! after a while, we decided to go bowling. the more i go bowling, the more i want my own PINK ball. haha...we'll see. i'm not even good at bowling. by the time our time was up, everyone was hungry again. so, we headed over to the house again to eat more. oh yeah, yesterday was the first time i got to really hang out with little keith. usually, he would be with other kids or whatever but i guess it was different since there wasn't that many people around! i have to admit...i kinda got attached to him. he's so cute and loving! =)

yesterday i went to the dmv to try to get my license renewed. by the time i got there, it was so freakin' tired. i couldn't even find parking. i kinda gave up and just pulled out of the parking lot...........then i realized that i came all that way and i wasn't gonna give up that easily. i ended up parking next door at smart n final. hehe. anyway, that place was so crowded! at the end, i decided not to wait! haha...what a waste of time. it's okay...i was kind of in a rush cuz i had to pick andy up from work...since his car was at the shop. at night, we went to dinner for jemeline's birthday at elephant bar. it was alright! the drinks were good but the food wasn't as great as i thought it would be. oh well. it was fun...i got to see the old gang again. after dinner, we went to my friend's (james) house as a meeting place cuz we were all going bowling at pikes place in long beach. so, we were there for a while since we wouldn't be able to get a lane for like 2 or 3 hours. that's so long. we drank a little more. some people were gambling. james has a poker table and a roulet (sp) table as well. lynce and i were so tired. we wanted to visit grace since she lives really close to james. ... but by that time, she was sleeping. oh well. so, we finally got to the bowling alley. it was my first time there...it looked really cool. the place where we went bowling at has a bunch of arcade games. we still had to wait a while till we got our lanes. it was okay cuz we were able to get some drinks. their fuzzy wuzzy is good! hehe...it's cheap too! we decided to play girls against the boys. there were a lot more girls than guyz so it took our game a LOOOONG time! i'll never do that again! hehe. to me, it's not as fun if you have so many people on the same lane. the game will just seem so long! i guess that's why it's worth it just to pay a little more to get another lane. oh well. anyway, i had a fun night. however, i like the bowling alley at the block a lot more than the one in long beach. it's just more of a relaxing atmosphere. well, maybe it was just the night. i ran into a few people i used to go to school with. one of em, i never really talked to. i only knew him cuz we had a few classes together...but still never talked. hehe. i was surprised that he went up to me! haha...=) tomorrow, some of my friends are coming over. jack had the day off so he and some people just wanted to come by and visit. we'll probably just have lunch or something. no big deal. good nite! =)

andy had the day off on monday and he spent most of his time helping his friends move. i was gonna help but the stuff that they were moving were all the big stuff...bed, sofa, etc. yeah, so i stayed home for a bit. a friend of mine wanted me to go to a urlLink world works seminar. actually, this person has actually been in the seminar for the past few days. i guess they wanted people to bring guest(s) to try to sell their product to us. it's so freakin' expensive! well, andy and i were debating whether or not we should go. andy already wanted to go to a different seminar. we just didn't know where to go...actually, we didn't know if we would even go anywhere cuz the move was taking andy longer than expected. the seminar started at 7pm and andy got home at 6:50pm. not only that, his friend came inside and it's not like we wanted to kick him out! hehe. well, i couldn't make up my mind. i wanted to go to my friend's thing but at the same time, i didn't wanna go alone. well, she called me again...asking if i can go. all she said was...i just wanted your support! ummm....i guess that got to me so i was gonna go w/ or without andy. well, he thought he was gonna make it on time but it was traffic?? so, yeah, it started at 7 and we didn't get there till like 8. it was in a hotel and we were trying to find out which banquet room it was in. we finally found it and we had to check in. after staying there for like 15 minutes, she asked everyone to do some kind of exercise. i think this seminar or this company helps you find yourself and to work on your self esteem. so, we got up and we were doing the exercise. my friend found us and i finally got to meet her boyfriend. well, her boyfriend had to leave. we asked my friend what time the seminar was gonna last. it turned out to be longer than we expected. after my friend and the bf went out of the room, andy asked if we can just leave too cuz he didn't wanna stay that long! it was kinda hard cuz the people who were working the seminar would stand so close to you to listen to your conversation. i just said that i had to go to the restroom and my plan was just to meet andy out there. hehe. so, we were finally out of the hotel. i had to call my friend to tell her that we couldn't stay cuz andy has to get up like at 4am. and what did she say? she said...can you take me home? first of all, you live in carson and we live in anaheim hills. hehe...i think if we had to, we'd do it. i guess she was having problems with her bf and he's the one who took her there. we were supposed to meet up at the front of the hotel and on our way there, we ran into her bf. she wanted to also leave since there was no way she can get home. but i was proud of her cuz going home or leaving would be the thing she'd normally do. this time she decided to stay strong and keep her word and her commitment to stay. her bf wanted to talk to us so we were supposed to go to starbucks. by the time we got there, it was closed so we stayed outside for about 30 minutes talking in the parking lot. i was glad i got to know the bf a little more. after that, we had to make another stop. we had to go to andy's friend's house. well, his friend is getting married in philippines so he asked us if we can dogsit for him. so, now we have a little pomerianian with coach! hehe...he's cute. he's a tanned version of my old dog snowball! we stayed at their house for a bit to make sure the two dogs got along. by the time we got home, it was 11pm. andy was getting frustrated. i kinda got frustrated too cuz i've never had to watch two dogs at once by myself. if i don't know a dog, i kinda get scared. yeah, i was traumatized when i was a kid. well, it's been 3 days since skippy has been here and i'm getting the hang of it. at times, i feel bad cuz i let coach do certain things that i don't want skippy to do. i.e. i let coach on the bed but i don't let skippy. in the beginning, they would both jump on the bed. hehe...i get grossed out with two dogs on the bed. i don't want this place to be a zoo. hehe.

hello. yesterday (saturday), we went to my brother's house for his 30th birthday! it was pretty fun. my cousins (mom's side), neices, nephew, friends, and other relatives from mel's side were there. my bro also invited our other cousins from my dad's side. he just told them to come later. they ended up getting there at like 9pm. geez. hehe. yeah...surprisingly, the party lasted that long. people were even playing mahjong. anyway, that night made me realize how people can be so immature. they can tell you one thing but mean another. such hippocrites. hehe. i'm not gonna mention any names but it's several people who let pride get in the way. pride is a sin. hehe. yeah, yeah, i know about that respect thing but it's not like there was no disrespect. it just makes me realize that i'm growing up and i'm noticing the importance of family...immediate or not. i think family should be there and give support to each other...even if some family members may not agree with you. but i guess that's my opinion...and that doesn't really count cuz i'm the youngest. hehe. =) anyway, when my cousins on my dad's side came, i hung out with them for a while in the garage. my brother has 3 rooms and the third room has a sliding door that goes right into the backyard. well, my mom was hanging out in that room w/ my other aunties and they can basically see outside and right into the garage. some cousins were having a corona so i decided to have one too. my mom is funny cuz I KNOW she knows that i would occassionally drink but she always tells me not to...same with my bro. so, as i was having my corona, sitting in the garage, i see my mom looking! hehe. i looked at her and raised the bottle to her! she was kinda laughing and then she blew a kiss to me and i caught it! haha...everyone was laughing. my bro also bought a nice bottle of tequilla. some people did shots (including andy). rod had some but instead of having it in shots, he had half a cup...twice. so, he had a FULL cup of tequilla. DANG! i kinda forgot that he was drinking but he got up to get something, and he kinda tripped over my legs. he's all like, dang...seriously, i could've tripped and fell! he even said that he was trying to walk straight towards mom and then he tripped. hehe. it was funny. that's when i noticed that he was kinda drunk or buzzed. some things were said that i never thought would be discussed. let's just say that a few years ago, something happened to andy. andy and i never really talk about it cuz it's something that he wants to keep in the past...which i understand. but saturday night, my brother brought it up! andy didn't mind but it was just something we never openly talked about...esp. in front of other people. at least i got to know how he felt about it. i guess i always knew but it's different to talk about it in a different time in life...instead of that moment in the past. did that make sense? i can't really mention what happened or be too descriptive but my brother remembered a lot more about the situation than i did. i was surprised. i was just glad to know that andy wasn't uncomfortable talking about it. it kinda showed how much my brother cared about me AND andy...which was nice. rod even mentioned how brave andy was and is. i guess even if that whole situation was brought up, it was nice to hear those words from my brother. on another note, my dad doesn't really drink. but that night, he decided to have a beer. it was kinda cool cuz we were all drinking together...which is something we've never done. so, we were having whatever conversations we were having. he was done with his beer and he decided to have another one. i just let it go but i told my brother. rod didn't want him to drink anymore cuz he still had to drive home...but my dad didn't give in. i was getting kinda nervous cuz honestly, i get scared of my dad when he's drunk. thank god, he didn't drink too much. i don't really see him get drunk anymore but he definetely used to scare me when i was a kid. i don't know if i mentioned it before in any of my blog entries but the day after my brother got married in 2002, there was a party at my parent's house for their gift opening. my dad made a promise to my brother to not get drunk on his wedding day but that he can drink the following day at the gift opening party. so, yeah, my dad drank. my auntie (across the street) and my mom were getting fed up at how much he was drinking. it's not like he was causing any trouble to anyone. he was basically just hanging out in a certain spot in the backyard w/ some of his friends and relatives. everyone was drinking. and then my aunt decided to go outside and take away all the drinks that my dad was drinking. that was kinda disrespectful cuz my aunt (who doesn't even live there) took away my dad's stuff in his own house. at first it was quiet. my dad didn't say anything but all of a sudden, he started yelling. he basically couldn't believe that he was treated like a kid in his own house. he was yelling and crying for a while. (yeah, my dad gets very emotional). anyway, my dad and aunt (who lives across the street) didn't talk for like 6 months. that's why i don't like it when he gets drunk. he can cause major drama!!! i just wish he can be more of a calm drunk. hehe.

thursday: we went to chuckee cheese in lakewood cuz it was my neice's (christina) 1st birthday. it was fun. we got to hang out with the de los reyes cousins. hehe. i was playing ski ball and there was some little girl that was climbing on the alley or whatever you call it right next to me. she kept taking my balls! (sounds nasty huh?) how rude. i was asking her where her mom was and i don't know if she understood me. hehe. i ended up having to carry my balls in my hands so she wouldn't take it. =) YUCK! friday: i woke up late! i had to run a few errands...post office, home depot, grocery store, and aaa. andy came home from work earlier so we can get some stuff done. after that, we went to cal state long beach to watch a basketball game. my brother was supposed to go but he's having a birthday party tomorrow so he needed to clean and i guess prep the food. instead, we invited joey and kristina. it was fun. we went because dennise rodman was playing for the long beach team and we wanted to see him. andy went a few weeks ago with my brother (before rodman was officially on the team). he had fun but he said it was probably 8 times more crowded tonight than it was a few weeks ago w/out rodman. it was just so cool to see rodman play. he basically got demoted from the nba to the aba! nontheless, everyone was still cheering for him. i guess he's still working his way up to the nba and just proving himself right now...to be serious instead of just goofin' off like he normally does. hehe. hulk hogan was also there! he was dressed the same as how i'd see him on tv. a lot of people were trying to get his attention and his autograph. at times, people would yell out his name and when he looked, he took his leather jacket off and RIPPED his tank top off! hehe ...it was funny. after a while, people were trying to get his attention AGAIN! he was like...what else am i supposed to take off...my pants?? hehe. after the game, we hung out at joe's house for a while. and now i'm home.

today is christine's birthday (andy's sis)------- HAPPY BIRTHDAY! =) we had dinner at todai with the family. as always the food was pretty good but i got so full from the soda. oh well. after that, we decided to go to the mall to walk around! we ended up splitting up...me w/ andy; andy's mom w/ dad; & christine w/ her friend sherrie. we also ended up going to walmart since it was around the corner. anyway, my mom bought me diamond earring studs. i've been wanting those for a long time. actually my mom bought me one a year or two ago but i gave it back to her cuz i wanted a screw on backing. so, i gave it to her a WHILE ago and i think she lost it! i've never seen em ever since. well, i bought these cute diamond dangling earrings to use for ross and mary's wedding. unfortunately, i ended up not using em because mary gave all the girls pearls (bracelet, earrings, and neclace) to use on the wedding day. i ended up asking my mom to return my earrings for me and what did she come back with? diamond studs! yay! hehe. i was supposed to wear em today but i lost the backing. getting a "screw on" was supposed to solve my problems but it didn't. since i can't just slide it off, i had to unscrew it and by the time it was about to come off, it fell. it's somewhere on our carpet but i can't find it! ooops.

i wanna get the simple life dvd. to me, that show is so funny...stupid but that's what makes it funny, i guess. yeah, it doesn't come out till jan. 20. hopefully it'll be on sale! =) anyway, yesterday i hung out with my brother. his wife was taking some kind of test and was really nervous about it. my brother ended up taking the day off to drive her to her test...which was in brea. he treated me for lunch at tokyo lobby. =) we also went to frys just to look around. i haven't been there for a LONG time. i used to go there a lot...esp. when i lived in fullerton. geezz...i can't believe it's already 2004. the years are just passing right by me! it's making me sad! =( i haven't even really accomplised much in my life...at least nothing that big of a deal! yeah, i graduated from college...but i'm JOBLESS! by the end of this month, i'm hoping, praying, & wishing that i'll have a job!!! hopefully everything will work out!!!

hello. i'm bored. i just got back from disneyland. first, we had to return something at downtown disney and then we headed over to disneyland. we went on one ride, andy got me a mulan penny, and then we went home! now we're just waiting for friends to start! hehe. i'm getting so excited that my brother's having a baby soon. it's like whenever i go to the store, i look at the baby stuff and i always wanna buy something...but i just don't. we don't even know if it's a boy or girl! i think they're just gonna find out when he or she is born. it's so weird. this will be my first real neice/nephew. justin, kayla, and kp are also but through my cousin. this will be from my brother! hehe. anyway, i went to carson on monday to do some stuff and just to visit. i told my mom that there was a sale at bath and body works. i think she likes to buy those lotions and stuff so she can bring some to philippines. so, we went and she bought a few things. after that store, we went to victoria's secret. she bought me some stuff! yay. a lot of stuff in that store was also on sale. and actually, sunday andy and i went to the mall cuz i had to return/exchange something at vs. so, i got stuff from there on sunday and monday! =) well, i guess i'll go now. i have nothing else to say. =)
